item.title: Need Checklist of things that i have to do to put server up! PLZ
item.dc:creator: @Stixx Stixx
item.description:
@Stixx wrote:

Here’s a checklist.
(Hamachi)

  1. Go to Logmeinhamachi.com and download it. (It will go through a mini tutorial on how to use it, when you first download it)

  2. To start your server, you need to create it. Go to create a new network and follow the layout.

  3. Once your network is all set up, your server ip is the numbers that show up when you put your cursor over it.

Hope you understand it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Checklist of things that i have to do to put server up! PLZ
item.dc:creator: @pkiller pkiller
item.description:
@pkiller wrote:

(HAM)
down load ham []
unblock it from fire wall []
open it []
click make net work []
make network name e.g MYserver[]
make pass word to it (123 or enter are good ones) []
open your compiler []
compile []
open run or runserver.bat []
run it []
go to advert section and tell people about it []
and it works now party!

Read full topic
